    "data": [

  "description": "The Maybelline Color Sensational Creamy Mattes Lipstick has a unique, velvety matte cream formula that offers a non-drying & un-crackable finish that stays comfortably on your lips through the day.These hydrating Maybelline lipstick shades are are infused with honey nectar to keep your lips moisturized all day long.
